context: Could you recommend some movies that are similar to Platoon?
Sure, you can try The Longest Day & Kingdom of Heaven.
It was written by James Jones and Cornelius Ryan. It is also a Crime/Action film.
Thanks, I love action movies. Do you know who is the starring actor in Longest Day?
Yes, it stars the great Jet Li and Jason Statham.
What about Kingdom of Heaven? What genre is that movie?
resp: It is another war film as well.
